languages.text: {n}Чародей смотрит на вас долгим тяжелым взглядом.{/n} "Есть еще одна тропа. Нет, не тропа — древняя бездна за пределами судьбы, куда не достигают Пути. Там ты носишь иной венец. С этим венцом у тебя есть все. С ним у тебя нет ничего. Приняв этот венец, ты не только отречешься от своего прездназначения, чемпион — сама жизнь станет твоим врагом. Таково мое последнее пророчество".

{n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Чародей смотрит на вас долгим тяжелым взглядом.{/n} "Есть еще одна тропа. Нет, не тропа — древняя бездна за пределами судьбы, куда не достигают Пути. Таково мое последнее пророчество".

languages.text: {n}Uralon vous adresse un regard long et pesant.{/n} « Il existe une autre voie. Ou plutôt un abysse immémorial situé en périphérie du destin, un lieu où aucune voie ne mène. Là-bas, c'est une tout autre couronne que vous portez. Avec elle, vous avez tout et rien à la fois. En l'acceptant, non seulement vous renoncerez à votre destinée, mais la vie elle-même deviendra votre ennemie. Telle est ma dernière prophétie vous concernant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon vous adresse un regard long et pesant.{/n} « Il existe une autre voie. Ou plutôt un abysse immémorial situé en périphérie du destin, un lieu où aucune voie ne mène. Là-bas, c'est une tout autre couronne que vous portez. Avec elle, vous avez tout et rien à la fois. En l'acceptant, non seulement vous renoncerez à votre destinée, mais la vie elle-même deviendra votre ennemie. Telle est ma dernière prophétie vous concernant. »

languages.text: {n}La mirada prolongada y pesada de Uralon recae sobre ti.{/n} «Solo hay una senda más. No, no es una senda... es un abismo ancestral más allá de los confines del destino, un lugar al que no conduce ninguna senda. Allí llevas otra corona, y con ella, lo tienes todo. Con ella, no tienes nada. Al aceptarla, no solo renunciarás a tu destino, sino que la vida misma se convertirá en tu enemiga. Esa es mi última profecía para ti».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."

No, no es una senda... es un abismo ancestral más allá de los confines del destino, un lugar al que no conduce ninguna senda. Allí llevas otra corona, y con ella, lo tienes todo. Con ella, no tienes nada. Al aceptarla, no solo renunciarás a tu destino, sino que la vida misma se convertirá en tu enemiga. Esa es mi última profecía para ti».

languages.text: {n}ウラロンの長く、重々しい眼差しがあなたに突き刺さる。{/n}「道はもう1つある。いや、それは道ではない。運命の果てを超えた古代の深淵、道なき道が続く場所だ。お前はそこで別の花輪を身に着ける。この花輪で、お前はすべてを手に入れる。この花輪で、お前は何も持たざる者となる。この花輪を受け入れれば、お前は運命を放棄するだけでなく、生そのものを敵とすることになる。それがお前に与える最後の予言だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウラロンの長く、重々しい眼差しがあなたに突き刺さる。{/n}「道はもう1つある。いや、それは道ではない。運命の果てを超えた古代の深淵、道なき道が続く場所だ。お前はそこで別の花輪を身に着ける。この花輪で、お前はすべてを手に入れる。この花輪で、お前は何も持たざる者となる。この花輪を受け入れれば、お前は運命を放棄するだけでなく、生そのものを敵とすることになる。それがお前に与える最後の予言だ」

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆久久地盯着你，沉重的目光压在你的身上。{/n}“还有另一条路——不，那并不是路，而是游离于命运边缘之外的古老深渊，没有任何道路能通往那里。在那里，你戴上了另一个花冠。有了那个花冠，你便拥有了一切，而有了那个花冠，你也将一无所有。一旦接受那个花冠，你不仅会放弃你的命运，就连生命本身也会成为你的宿敌。这是我对你最后的预言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆久久地盯着你，沉重的目光压在你的身上。{/n}“还有另一条路——不，那并不是路，而是游离于命运边缘之外的古老深渊，没有任何道路能通往那里。在那里，你戴上了另一个花冠。有了那个花冠，你便拥有了一切，而有了那个花冠，你也将一无所有。一旦接受那个花冠，你不仅会放弃你的命运，就连生命本身也会成为你的宿敌。这是我对你最后的预言。”

languages.text: {n}Uralons langer, durchdringender Blick lastet schwer auf dir.{/n} "Es gibt noch einen Weg. Nein, keinen Weg ... einen uralten Abgrund jenseits der Ränder des Schicksals, einen Ort, an den kein Weg führt. Dort tragt Ihr einen anderen Kranz. Mit diesem Kranz habt Ihr alles. Mit diesem Kranz habt Ihr nichts. Nehmt Ihr ihn an, entsagt Ihr nicht nur Eurem Schicksal, sondern das Leben selbst wird Euer Feind. Das ist meine letzte Prophezeiung für Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing. Upon accepting it, not only will you renounce your destiny, but life itself will become your enemy. That is my final prophecy to you."

Mit diesem Kranz habt Ihr nichts. Nehmt Ihr ihn an, entsagt Ihr nicht nur Eurem Schicksal, sondern das Leben selbst wird Euer Feind. Das ist meine letzte Prophezeiung für Euch."

languages.text: {n}Uralon; baskıcı gözlerle sana uzun uzun, ağır ağır bakıyor.{/n} "Bir yol daha var. Hayır, bu bir yol değil. Kaderin köşelerinin ötesindeki kadim bir hiçlik. Hiçbir Yolun gitmediği bir yer. Orada başka bir taç takıyorsun. Bu taç ile her şeye sahip oluyorsun. Bu taç ile hiçbir şeyin olmuyor. Onu kabul ederek yalnızca kaderinden feragat etmiş olmuyorsun, direkt olarak yaşam senin düşmanın hâline geliyor. Sana dair son görüm budur."
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon's long, heavy look presses down on you.{/n} "There is one more path. No, it is not a path — an ancient abyss beyond the edges of fate, a place where no Ways lead. You wear another wreath there. With this wreath, you have everything. With this wreath, you have nothing.
